Greetings,

 I was wondering if you could supply me with any information on=
 :

 Fujii no Kogen
   and 
  Fujii Taroemon
 
     They were brothers... b=
ut Kogen served the Amako Clan..and when 
the Amako lost to the Mori, he wa=
s forced to shave his head and 
retire... but then he meet with Oda Nobunag=
a who reinstated his 
samurai status (hired him) and he faught against the =
Mori. He took 
Kannabe Castle (which he had been running when the Amako wer=
e 
around) from the Mori ..but they eventually took it back and he died 
la=
ter during the following combat. This was in the Summer of 1569.

      his=
 brother, Fujii Taroemon... actually served the Mori from 
the get go... he=
 was a Naval Captain, I think.... I am pretty sure 
he use to fight Oda's f=
leets in the waters between West Honshu and 
Shikoku (from Hiroshima to Osa=
ka).  I believe he eventually retired 
and he and one of his sons shaved th=
eir heads and became 
monks/priest.. one Shingon and the other to Pure Land=
... I think.

      The third brother, Fujii Saburoemon... I know nothing a=
bout. I 
think he ended up traveling from Bitchu to Hazu-gun in Nagoya.

  =
    The fourth brother.. I have no idea... although I think he 
might be re=
lated somehow to Kurozaemon perhaps.

     Anyway..this all took place in W=
est Honshu out in the Mori 
territories (like around Hiroshima and Okayama =
and Osaka)

   Any info you could find/help me with.. I would appreciate it=
.
  
 Thank you !
